about_the_game:
Welcome to the Half-Baked Girls demo!

You can play through the first chapter of the main story in the demo.
You can carry your saved data from the demo over to the full version of the game.

The demo has the following limitations:

The characters' levels are capped at 10.
Held money is capped at 999PP.
The demo version cannot load data from the full version.

I hope you enjoy playing the demo.

name: HALF-BAKED GIRLS Demo
